moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nc3 Nf6 3. Bc4 Nxe4: Introducing the fork trick 4.Nxe4 d5! Here White can consider 4.Bxf7+
moves.9... d6 10. Bxh6 Be6 11. Qf3 Bxb3 12. Bx: Is castling not a good option here?
moves.21... Bxh1 22. Nxf7 Bd5 23. Nxd6+ Kf8 24: Even before the arrival of the Bishop on c6 I think this move is playable.
And Black resigned as his King and Rook were imprisoned. The Bishop alone is no match for the white King and the advancing pawns!
